content.question: A parallel-plate capacitor has capacitance <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>C</mi></math>. Which of the following correctly predicts the new capacitance if the area of both plates increases by a factor of <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> while all other quantities remain the same?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
